name: Vikings Don't Wear Horns
description:
Play as a real Viking and smash the endless hordes of fake, horn-wearing Vikings in this small, silly, arcade-style game.

How to play:

Avoid the fake Vikings coming at you. Jump on them or dodge their attacks. Walk off screen to get to the other side. Pick up power-ups to gain health, size and invincibility. Survive as long as possible for a high score.

Controls:

Use WASD to move and jump
